Hi Agustin,

I have a concerns regarding view switching in PrismFrameWork. When i using n-number of views if i want to share and switch in the common region, what is the possible way i choose. Please guide me on this if you provide me the sample for this concepts it is much appreciatable.

Hoping for the better solution.

Thanks and Regards,

Sakthi

Hi,

You might find View-Switching navigation useful to fulfill your requirement. You can check the following resources, which contain samples that demonstrates how to use the Prism Region Navigation API:

  • Prism Training Kit (there you will find the Navigation Lab, which Explains the view-based navigation approach supported by the Prism API)
  • View-Switching Navigation QuickStart

Also you might find useful information in the Prism  documentation at MSDN:

  • Chapter 8: Navigation, View-Based Navigation

I hope you find this handy.
